Ok i finished this a few months but after being reminded by a friend so i have to say, i loved Robopocalypse for just some many reasons...

which now comes to the main reason for this thread which is to discuss how apt the information is in case of a robot apocalypse and also to discuss the leaps in robotics that would have to occur for this to happen (especially Archos and the Freeborn)

if you hadn't read the book i suggest you should after putting down World War Z (and getting bent out of shape about the world war z movie) please

discuss below
